casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Napier Sandford FULLER 378P18-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Napier Sandford Fuller, for Fuller, Napier Sandford. Peter A. Regulski, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney Generals, Blake M. Courlang, District Attorney, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of March 2019 by Defendant for Notice and Request for Disability Accommodations to Ensure Due Process:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
